title: Ep 154: Radical and Unapologetic Self-Care with Forever35 Essential Workers
itunes:title: Ep 154: Radical and Unapologetic Self-Care with Forever35 Essential Workers
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree hear from essential workers about how they take care of themselves, teachers who have the added responsibility of COVID safety duty, and they hear the self-care practices of a 911 operator. Plus, they wonder whether 4th graders go to boa...
description:
Kate and Doree hear from essential workers about how they take care of themselves, teachers who have the added responsibility of COVID safety duty, and they hear the self-care practices of a 911 operator. Plus, they wonder whether 4th graders go to boarding school.


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.


This week’s episode is sponsored by:
